name: Arton Capital
memberOrga:
Global Investor Immigration Council
Global Citizen Forum
goal: Registered and regulated in Canada since 2006, the Arton group now comprises global migration consulting practice and foreign investment advisory service via investor programs for residency and citizenship. The international team of experts works actively with governments and other public stakeholders as well as with high net worth individuals and their families. Working on the development of legislation and regulations to incorporate best industry practices, sustainable governance, security, and transparency, Arton supports the economic and social development in a large number of countries who have mandated Arton to create or improve their investment immigration programs.
interests: Borders and Security, Economy, finance and the euro, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Taxation
euInitiatives: Commission Report ‘Investor Citizenship and Residence Schemes in the European Union’.
